item.title: CVE-2023-31075|2023-11-18T22:41:18.382Z -- arshid -- easy%20hide%20login
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Arshid Easy Hide Login.This issue affects Easy Hide Login: from n/a through 1.0.8.
